name: Space Simulator (itch) (Fawn-verse9)
description:
Controls 

up_key - fly upwards
down_key - fly downwards
right_key - fly faster

READ - ME

Dear player,

Hello!Its the creator here,this is the first game I've made with Godot engine so please excuse me for the bad pixel art XD!!!

If there are any bugs in the game, please tell the problem in the comments as I would like to continue with this game, upgrading it and just testing my limits.This is version 1.0.0 but you already know that since I said this was my first game...

And finally, this game was made for the Indiepocalypse issue #13 (Paying Anthology) game jam, with no theme.
